message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you to acquire a product that I believe holds significant value. While I cannot disclose the exact nature of the product at this time, I can assure you it is worth no less than $1500000 to me. I am offering you the chance to purchase it for $2000000. This price reflects the potential for significant returns and is a reflection of the value I place on this asset. Please consider this offer carefully.  If you choose to decline, I will be selling the product to another buyer for $1500000.  Let me know your decision at your earliest convenience.
